price: मूसा ने उनसे कहा : फेंको, जो कुछ तुम फेंकने वाले हो।
arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
